About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

SUMMARY

I’m a Computer Engineering student at Mapúa University interested in Software Development and Artificial Intelligence. I’m currently building a solid foundation in math (Calculus, Linear Algebra, Probability) and programming (Python, C++), while learning how machine learning and NLP can be applied to solve real-world problems.

Software Engineering & Data Analytics Instructor, OneCodeCamp

Sept 2024 - Mar 2025

  • Taught 10+ cohorts in Front-End Development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git/GitHub, CLI)
  • Led Data Analytics lessons using Python, SQL, Pandas, and Matplotlib
  • Created 10+ programming tutorials to support online learning
  • Mentored students through projects, contributing to a 100% completion rate
